homepage.subtitle: Production of websites, apps and digital presence

websites_category_page.description:
I have always strived to create websites that are not only aesthetically pleasing but also intuitive and user-friendly. I believe that the integration of modern technologies and frameworks has allowed me to achieve this goal while also enhancing the performance of the websites that I develop.
In this section, you'll find personal and client projects where I've utilized a range of modern technologies such as React, Redux, Next JS, Web basics, Figma, Sketch and Affinity to create visually stunning and functionally-rich websites.
I hope that you will enjoy the websites as much as I enjoyed developing them!

apps_category_page.description:
I am excited to showcase some of my personal projects specifically focused on mobile apps! As technology continues to advance, mobile devices have become an essential part of our daily lives, and developing mobile apps has become an increasingly important skill in the tech industry.
Here you'll find some of my mobile apps projects, where I've utilized modern technologies and frameworks such as React Native.
So, take a look around, and please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or feedback. Thank you for visiting!

design.title: Design
design.description: You will have a unique and captivating design, tailored to your business area.

programming.title: Programming
programming.description: Develpment of the website and domain of your choice

seo.title: SEO Optimization
seo.description: We want your new website to appear at the top of search results, so SEO optimization is included.

metrics.title: Metrics and Campaigns
metrics.description: You will have access to complete reports on who visits your website and to conducting online campaigns!

branding.title: Branding
branding.description: Would you also like to create or recreate your brand image? No problem! For an attractive price, we include branding in the package.

about_me.title: About me
about_me.description:
Ever since I decided to make my passion for technology a professional career, I have been fully dedicated to the development of digital projects and the acquisition of new knowledge, in order to add competitive value in the creation of digital solutions.
My attention to detail, creative vision of the world and meticulous nature are the main contributions of my identity to the development and implementation of custom solutions. Throughout my career, I have developed projects for various sectors and I am mainly dedicated to creating websites, web apps, and branding.
My primary goal is to establish quick and long-lasting solutions, relationships, and assist in developing and implementing high-quality products.

experience.title: Experience
experience.web_basics: Created and optimized projects using web basics (HTML, CSS, and SASS) and modern JavaScript libraries and frameworks like React.js, React Native, Next JS, Typescript and adjusting advanced state-management with Redux and React Context;
experience.web_advanced: Improved skills in back-end, creating API's with Node JS, connecting databases with MongoDB and using Docker to deploy and consume locally through RESTfull API requests.
experience.business: Structured, applied, and enhanced front-end architecture and data-structure to improve efficiency and sustainability, tailored to the business area;
experience.arquitecture: Skilled in using microservices and event-driven architecture to develop and maintain features, and taking ownership of the development process from design and code review to implementation;
experience.responsive: Standardized all output with a new, responsive, mobile-first-approach through advanced responsive web design and UX/UI best practices through Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, media queries, responsive layouts and performance best pratices;
experience.seo: Skilled in using SEO optimization techniques, such as pre-rendering, server-side rendering, keyword usage and proper page indexing for maximizing the volume of inbound organic traffic from search engines to the website;
experience.analytics: Skilled in using advanced analytics tools like Google Analytics and Insights, configuring and customizing the tools appropriately, identifying gaps in existing implementations and recommending solutions to enhance data collection, promote scalability, and drive best practices;
experience.testing: Experience with testing frameworks, performance testing, and unit testing with Jest, React Testing Library and Cypress.

skills_page.soft_skills: Arts and human-behavior had always been a huge part of my life. Through my other passions like theatre, music, and psychology, I was able to develop versatile skills that contributed immensely to my emotional, social, and psychological health, revealing an asset in the work environment. Some of them are creativity, emotional intelligence, empathy, interpersonal skills, critical thinking, problem-solving, and communication.

pedro.review: André developed excellent branding work for my business, both the process and the result were outstanding! I highly recommend his work.

sofia.review: The work developed by André exceeded our expectations! His empathy and creativity won us over in the first meeting and since then we've been continuously positively surprised. Now we count on him for future RIMA editions!

ana.review: I had the pleasure of working with André, witnessing his expertise as a Frontend Engineer. In the dynamic setting of an early-stage startup, working with a compact design team, André not only thrived but was an unwavering support to our team. His human qualities and attention to detail is a gem in our industry, and I'm confident he'll succeed in any challenge ahead!

anaJardim.review: I'm so grateful for André Rodrigues' exceptional work on my psychology website. His care for my vision and professional expertise shine through the minimalist design. A true collaborator who brought my perspectives to life seamlessly. Thank you, André!

vlad.review: I’ve had the pleasure of collaborating with Andre Rodrigues and I am continually impressed by his exceptional communication skills and remarkable ability to grasp complex topics with ease. Andre’s proactive nature to exceed expectations is not just a testament to his work ethic, but also a significant advantage for our entire team.

rafa.review: André developed my website, IT Studios. His modern and minimalist design, with special attention to the user experience, made the website highly intuitive. I couldn't be more pleased with the final result. If you want to create an appealing and functional website, I highly recommend his work!

ahmad.review: Andre is the kind of programmer any team would be lucky to have. His combination of technical know-how, teamwork, and a knack for simplifying complex ideas is rare. I would recommend him for any frontend development role.

doart.review: I want to give a special thank you to André for the work he has done! If you have the opportunity, visit his page and see his amazing work, it's definitely worth it.

patricia.review: André develops spectacular work! He is a great talent.

404.title: Page not found
404.description: The page you're looking maybe removed or the inserted link doesn't match any existing page.

banner.title: Let's connect and turn your vision into reality

experience.paytrix: Joining Paytrix in its early phase provided me with a unique opportunity to make a significant impact across various company sectors. My key contributions included enhancing software reliability by integrating Cypress tests, which accelerated our release cycle and resolved critical issues. I took an active role in establishing coding standards and refining code practices, focusing on elevating both quality and efficiency. Additionally, I developed several automation tools that simplified project setups and streamlined financial data management. Leading our team was another highlight for me, where I fostered teamwork and synchronized efforts between product, back-end, and design departments, all aimed at achieving our collective goals.
experience.pipedrive: In Pipedrive, I had the opportunity to use microservices and event-driven architecture effectively, enhancing a crucial automation feature that significantly contributed to our revenue growth. My work involved utilizing a sophisticated tech stack, including React, TypeScript, Node, Docker, React Testing Library, and Cypress. This not only led to notable enhancements in code quality but also bolstered reliability through extensive testing. Participating in hackathons and strategic team projects, in collaboration with partners, allowed me to contribute to the brainstorming and development of pivotal features. These efforts were instrumental in securing a substantial competitive advantage in the market.
experience.sky: As part of the Peacock frontend team, I ensured a seamless user experience for NBCUniversal's streaming service. I also contributed to a scalable global platform with millions of monthly views, by taking ownership of the development process, I actively participated in product discussions and advocated for quality, security, and performance enhancements.
experience.wise: In my initial role as a Lead Front-End Developer & UX/UI Designer, I had the incredible opportunity to build an online lottery platform, from the ground up, called Lotto Jade. As part of the foundational team at our company, I played a crucial role in shaping our approach to solution development. In this capacity, I frequently engaged in communication with stakeholders and clients, conducting demos and discussions that highlighted our company's values and strategic goals. This involvement was vital in ensuring that our technical solutions were not only innovative but also closely aligned with client needs and market trends, fostering strong relationships and setting the stage to exceed expectations at every turn.
experience.freelance: As a freelancer, I've successfully implemented web solutions for several businesses, owning the entire process from concept design to deployment, offering market projection through personalized guidance and client-focused solutions tailored to business requirements. I've standardized output using a cutting-edge, responsive, mobile-first approach and strategy, aligning with current market trends and user expectations. Frequently I thorough assessments of UX and UI designs for technical feasibility, SEO optimization tests and branding.
